title: What Taylor Swift song do you hate? - Quora

response.answer_text: look what you made me do it has so many repetitive lyrics (“ohh… look what you made me do…” x3.14) and LWYMMD is just not who Taylor really is. she just let all the negativity and all the drama forced her so much at that time. and it’s also just a song to clapback at all the haters and her enemies, otherwise, it doesn’t make any sense. ME! this song is terrible. i feel embarrassed by this song. it’s cheesy, colorful, and childish. and i can’t believe Taylor wrote this song when she was 29? what does this song even mean? why does Taylor write this kiddy song? i don’t know… bad blood i like the live version of bad blood. but i don’t like the song (the studio version) for some reasons. bad blood is a terrible song that she used to aim at Katy Perry for stealing Taylor’s dancers… and it’s also NOT who Taylor is. i love Taylor and her music, but these 3 songs are NOT them. they are not good.

The only Taylor Swift song that I don’t care for is You Need To Calm Down. It’s an insult to all Christians that believe that marriage is always between a man and a woman and that it’s the gay community that needs to calm down.
